name: All I Can Think About Is You
content: Whole world on a flight path
不禁好奇 该何去何从
Troubles on the outside I know
我知晓 麻烦不断 争议不休
But now all I can think about is you
此时此刻 脑海闪现你的身影
All I can think about is you
时时刻刻 我想念的只是你
If all that I'm on earth to do
Then what a lone poor shoe
I want to walk in a two
即便这世界都弃你而去
All I can think about is you
时时刻刻 我想念的只是你
All I can think about is you
时时刻刻 我想念的只是你
爱是这世界所剩的唯一真诚
